name: Project Wight
summary: Project Wight is an open-world RPG (role-playing game) game that puts you in control of a creature. For once you aren't the human killing creatures in the world; instead you are the creature attempting to escape and defend yourself against Vikings who are constantly trying to kill you.
info:
• 开发: The Outsiders
  • 游戏类型: RPG
  • 官方网站: theoutside.rs
